original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2411)@ 召喚邪靈化為兵刃，在武將四周飛舞，定期對周圍的敵方士兵造成$Skill_Str(2661)@武力傷害與$Skill_Str(2661)@智力傷害，被傷害到的士兵死亡以後會化為<color=#4cc769>屍鬼</color>為我方戰鬥。 <color=#4cc769>屍鬼</color>屬性 <color=#FFE787>體力值：</color>$Soldier_HP(1286)@ 武力值：$Soldier_Str(1286)@
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2411)@ Summon evil spirits into weapons, flying around the generals, regularly inflicting $Skill_Str(2661)@武力 damage on surrounding enemy soldiers With $Skill_Str(2661)@INT damage, the injured soldier will turn into a <color=#4cc769>ghoul</color> to fight for our side after death. <color=#4cc769>Ghouls</color> Attributes <color=#FFE787>Stamina value: </color>$Soldier_HP(1286)@ Force value:  $Soldier_Str(1286)@
